title: Boost one flagship project
tip: Select your most impressive build and reframe it with a story arc: problem, solution, measurable impact. Use a single hero graphic optimized for 1440px displays.
actions: Add outcome metrics (users reached, hours saved) in the project card.
Record a 30-second Loom walkthrough and link it in the details accordion.

title: Publish a curated case study series
tip: AI suggested presenting three projects as a themed series (design, data, systems). Each post should highlight decision trade-offs and code snippets.
actions: Draft 3 medium-length blog posts (500–700 words) covering challenge, approach, and test results.
Cross-link the posts inside the Projects section to keep visitors exploring.

title: Prep a punchy outreach note
tip: Feed your portfolio headline into an AI copy editor to craft a two-sentence intro email. Personalize the second sentence with why you admire the recipient’s work.
actions: Highlight one collaborative feature (like the GitHub integration) to show teamwork.
Link to the live deployment and invite quick feedback.

title: Host a mini livestream
tip: AI recommended running a 20-minute Twitch/YouTube walkthrough of your portfolio update. Use chapter markers so recruiters can jump to what matters.
actions: Script the session with an AI outline tool, focusing on problem-solving moments.
Repurpose highlights into LinkedIn clips to widen reach.

title: Micro-learning sprints
tip: Take a recent Stack Overflow thread, have AI summarize the debate, then rebuild the solution in a CodePen snippet. Document the takeaway in your portfolio changelog.
actions: Schedule two 25-minute sessions this week for focused replication.
Add a 'What I learned' badge next to the updated component.

title: AI-curated syllabus
tip: Use an AI planner to chunk a new technology (e.g., Astro or Svelte) into a 4-week roadmap. Each week culminates in a portfolio enhancement that showcases the concept.
actions: Week 1: Layout fundamentals — convert About section into the new framework.
Week 4: Deploy and collect Core Web Vitals metrics to prove mastery.
